string.text:
Estradiol valerate, a hormone medication, has shown potential in enhancing psychological resilience and providing protective effects against the traumatic experiences encountered in the Zone.
 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] improves morale and psychological protection in the Zone
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes dizziness
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] may cause (un)wanted body shape changes
